title: Basic Framework of Scientific Paper-for more readable paper
excerpt: This version of paper framework is based on the structure of INFOCOM 2020 that I have submitted. Even if the paper submitted to INFOCOM is the second one I have written, I still have problems in: WHAT to write in Abstract and Intro; HOW to tell things clear for readers who are not familiar with the academic background. Therefore, I tend to summarize the experience of writing a scientific paper and hope to IMPROVE THE WRITING SKILLS both logically and linguistically.
